title: I Refuse to Live in a Surveillance State (Ep 1435)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the impeachment “hearing” debacle on Capitol Hill and the growing threat of the tech tyrants. I also give an inside baseball update on Parler.

News Picks:

The violence at the Capitol was partially coordinated on Twitter. 


One of the House Democrats leading the charge voted against certifying the results on the 2016 election. 

Twitter CEO humiliates himself on Twitter.


Twitter’s twisted logic is laughable. 


Texas woman arrested for alleged voter fraud.

Was Nancy Pelosi inciting violence in 2018? 

Dopey media types are accusing a GOP lawmaker of insurrection for quoting Nancy Pelosi.
